columns.title: Inbound
columns._format: <form system-form method="POST" action="/api/data?collection=profiles" reload="true"><input type="checkbox" name="target" ng-checked="row.target && row.target == session.uid" value="{{row.target == session.uid ? null : session.uid}}" onchange="event.target.form.submit(event);" /><input type="hidden" name="_id" value="{{row._id}}" /><input type="hidden" name="category" value="numbers" /></form>
columns.format: <form system-form method="POST" action="/api/services" reload="true"><input type="checkbox" name="action" ng-checked="row.users[session.uid].added" value="{{row.users[session.uid].added ? 'remove' : 'add'}}" onchange="event.target.form.submit(event);" /><input type="hidden" name="_id" value="{{session.uid}}" /><input type="hidden" name="category" value="users" /><input type="hidden" name="uid" value="{{row._id}}" /></form>
columns._format: <form system-form method="POST" action="/api/services" key="session.profile"><input type="checkbox" name="action" ng-checked="session.profile.numbers[row._id].added" value="{{session.profile.numbers[row._id].added ? 'remove' : 'add'}}" onchange="event.target.form.submit(event);" /><input type="hidden" name="_id" value="{{row._id}}" /><input type="hidden" name="category" value="{{row.category}}" /><input type="hidden" name="uid" value="{{session.uid}}" /></form>
